$$._: This introductory chapter starts by presenting the challenges of current and future wireless networks, especially in the context of 5G networks. The chapter then presents the outline of the different chapters of this book, with a short description of the content of each chapter. This book will cover different aspects of radio propagation channels, experimental channel measurements, over-the-air testing, signal processing, networking layer for 5G, IoT systems, IoT for healthcare, and finally localization and tracking.
